name: Crazy 24（brain competition)
description:
Are you good at donig a sum in your head? Come here to check who is the fastest.

Crazy 24 is a digit game. The game goal is to use mathematical operators (+,-,x,/) to connect the digits which the four cards represented, make the result equals to 24.

In that special times, this game riches our lessure time. A lot of friends along with you and your competitor, watch the brain battle between you and your competitor. It's intense and also exciting. Now, you can play this game on iphone or ipad, to challenge the person all over the world.

Come and challenge your brain, you're the best, really? See you at crazy 24!
